structure1: C = Capital letters, S = Symbols or Digits
prefix_advise: Creating a prefix with digits or special characters can strengthen the password
suffix_advise: We advise adding some more digits or special characters
base_advises: We strongly advise replacing the base word
policy_based: Consider a password longer than 11 characters
Consider using 1 or more symbols in your password
Consider using 1 or more capital letters in your password
